kgschart
========

`kgschart` is an R package for parsing KGS rank graphs into numeric data ([KGS](http://gokgs.com/) is an online platform for the game of go).
See [Documentation](https://kota7.github.io/kgschart-r/) for package introduction,
or visit the [web app](https://kota.shinyapps.io/kgschart-app/) to try 
the package functionality on browsers.

## Installation

This package is not on CRAN yet. Install it from the GitHub repository. 

```R
devtools::install_github("kota7/kgschart-r")
```
